projects.title: Jayfii
projects.description: Stock Tracking & Management application including with E-commerce functionalities. Built solo.
modalContent: Jayfii is a French e-commerce application combined with Stock & Tracking Management allowing sellers to keep track of their sales & product availability.
I built it with Angular on the frontend using RxJS for performance and Angular Material to improve UX.

projects.title: EJTRACE
projects.description: A French app to monitor vehicle fleets with real-time trip histories—improving financial oversight and transparency.

projects.title: Team Touba Façade
projects.description: Website showcasing façade renovation projects, offering a platform for clients to explore architectural transformations.

projects.title: Netflix
projects.description: A user-friendly Netflix clone reproducing core functionalities.
modalContent: Built with Google and GitHub OAuth to speed up authentication.
Users can maintain a custom list of series and watch them.
